Commands.Power of the Crystal: Reduces target's BRV to 3/4, then ranged BRV attack + HP attackModerately consumes own HP if Chelinka's Prayer not active
Commands.Rela Crystal: Holy magic BRV attackSelf: 2 turns MAX BRV Up II, Chelinka's PrayerConsumes all BRV upon use if Chelinka's Prayer not already active

Artifacts.HP Damage Guard: Raises Defense Power by 20% after taking HP damage.
Artifacts.The Twins' Bond Boost: Increases the effects of The Twins' Bond by 5%.
Artifacts.Mighty Power of the Crystal: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Power of the Crystal by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Rela Crystal: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Rela Crystal by 10%.

Passives.Power of the Crystal Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Power of the Crystal.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Rela Crystal Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Rela Crystal.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Power of the Crystal Charge: Increases the max uses of Power of the Crystal by 1.
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Rela Crystal Charge: Increases the max uses of Rela Crystal by 1.
Passives.The Twins' Bond: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense when Chelinka's Prayer is active.

Weapons.Brave Sword: Increases the potency of Rela Crystal, BRV Attack and BRV Attack+.Increases Rela Crystal's max uses by 1.Increases the potency and extends the duration of Max BRV Up and Chelinka's Prayer.
Weapons.Gladius: Increases Power of the Crystal's potency.Makes its first hit lower target's BRV by 1/2 (instead of 1/4).
